Room.Name: Main Courtyard - Center West
Room.ShortDescription: You are on the parade deck of Prince Rutger's central courtyard.
Room.LongDescription: The review stand is to the north, and a tier of seats for visitors and observers is to the northwest. On the north wall of the castle you can see a silk banner with the crest of Rutger on it. The banner is in black edged with silver trim. The troops who assemble here also wear black uniforms or armor with silver piping and silver accessories, colors of Lyanden Castle.
